Mud_Flap.name: Mud Flap
Mud_Flap.description: Protect your car from dirt and road debris. Ensures a cleaner and more polished look.
Mud_Flap.features: Durable material, Easy to install, Compatible with most car models
Mud_Flap.guidance: Ensure the mud flap is securely fastened to prevent detachment during drives.
Mud_Flap.warranty_and_return: 1-year warranty. Returns accepted within 30 days of purchase if unused.

Allow_wheel.name: Alloy Wheel
Allow_wheel.description: Enhance your carâ€™s style with durable alloy wheels. Adds a sleek and modern finish.
Allow_wheel.features: Lightweight alloy, Rust-resistant finish, Sleek design
Allow_wheel.guidance: Check compatibility with your car model before purchase.
Allow_wheel.warranty_and_return: 2-year warranty. Returns accepted for manufacturing defects within 15 days.

Body_Styling_kit.name: Body Styling Kit
Body_Styling_kit.description: Upgrade your car's aesthetics with a premium styling kit. Perfect for a sporty and elegant appearance.
Body_Styling_kit.features: Customizable parts, High-quality finish, Enhances aerodynamics
Body_Styling_kit.guidance: Professional installation recommended for best results.
Body_Styling_kit.warranty_and_return: 6-month warranty. No returns on installed products.

Body_cover.name: Body Cover
Body_cover.description: Protect your car from dust, rain, and UV rays. Designed for a snug and secure fit.
Body_cover.features: Waterproof material, UV protection, Lightweight and foldable
Body_cover.guidance: Ensure the car is clean and dry before covering.
Body_cover.warranty_and_return: 1-year warranty. Returns accepted within 7 days for unused covers.

Car_charger.name: Car Charger
Car_charger.description: Charge your devices on the go with this compact charger. Compatible with all major gadgets.
Car_charger.features: Dual USB ports, Fast charging support, Compact design
Car_charger.guidance: Use only compatible cables for charging.
Car_charger.warranty_and_return: 6-month warranty. Returns accepted within 15 days of delivery.

carpet_mat.name: Carpet Mat
carpet_mat.description: Durable mats to keep your car interior clean and tidy. Designed for maximum comfort and fit.
carpet_mat.features: Non-slip backing, Easy to clean, Water-resistant
carpet_mat.guidance: Shake off dirt regularly and clean with mild soap.
carpet_mat.warranty_and_return: 3-month warranty. Returns accepted for defective products within 10 days.

Door_visor.name: Door Visor
Door_visor.description: Shield your car from rain and sunlight while driving. Adds a sleek design element to your doors.
Door_visor.features: Durable acrylic material, Weather-resistant, Easy installation
Door_visor.guidance: Align properly before sticking to ensure a secure fit.
Door_visor.warranty_and_return: 1-year warranty. Returns accepted within 15 days of delivery.

Front_parking_sensor.name: Front Parking Sensor
Front_parking_sensor.description: Navigate tight spaces easily with accurate parking sensors. Ensures safety and convenience.
Front_parking_sensor.features: High precision, Durable sensors, Easy integration
Front_parking_sensor.guidance: Professional installation required for optimal performance.
Front_parking_sensor.warranty_and_return: 1-year warranty. Returns not accepted after installation.

radio.name: Radio
radio.description: Enjoy crisp sound and clear channels with this advanced radio system. Perfect for road trips.
radio.features: Digital tuning, Multiple frequency bands, Clear sound quality
radio.guidance: Ensure proper wiring for consistent performance.
radio.warranty_and_return: 6-month warranty. Returns accepted within 10 days for defective units.

rear_upperspoiler.name: Rear Upper Spoiler
rear_upperspoiler.description: Boost aerodynamics and style with this rear spoiler. Gives your car a sporty edge.
rear_upperspoiler.features: Aerodynamic design, Lightweight material, Stylish appearance
rear_upperspoiler.guidance: Professional fitting recommended for secure attachment.

reverse_camera.name: Reverse Camera
reverse_camera.description: Park safely with a clear view of the rear. Designed for precision and ease of use.
reverse_camera.features: Wide-angle lens, Night vision, High-resolution display
reverse_camera.guidance: Ensure proper alignment during installation to avoid blind spots.
reverse_camera.warranty_and_return_policy: 1-year manufacturer warranty with a 15-day return policy.

seat.name: Seat
seat.description: Premium seat covers for comfort and durability. Keeps your car looking fresh and stylish.
seat.guidance: Use a mild detergent for cleaning to ensure longevity.
seat.warranty_and_return_policy: 6-month manufacturer warranty with a 10-day return policy.

speaker.name: Speaker
speaker.description: Immerse yourself in high-quality sound with these powerful speakers. Ideal for music lovers.
speaker.features: Surround sound, Bass boost, Durable build
speaker.guidance: Install in designated slots for optimal sound performance.
speaker.warranty_and_return_policy: 2-year manufacturer warranty with a 20-day return policy.

tail_lamp.name: Tail Lamp
tail_lamp.description: Bright and stylish tail lamps for enhanced visibility. Designed for safety and aesthetics.
tail_lamp.guidance: Avoid exposure to water during installation to ensure electrical safety.
tail_lamp.warranty_and_return_policy: 1-year manufacturer warranty with a 15-day return policy.

Television.name: Smart Television
Television.description: Turn your car into an entertainment hub with this smart TV. Compact and feature-rich.
Television.features: HD display, Wi-Fi enabled, Compact design
Television.guidance: Ensure a stable power connection for uninterrupted viewing.
Television.warranty_and_return_policy: 1-year manufacturer warranty with a 30-day return policy.
